column1: #text=Last night we decided to head into New York City .
#text=Driving in was not a good option , who wants to deal with that kind of traffic ?
#text=So we decide a better idea was to take the train in .
#text=We parked our car at the train station in Newark and prepaid for weekend parking .
#text=I grabbed a small bag and we went to the ticket window to purchase our tickets .
#text=After that we just had to wait for our train to arrive and begin boarding .
#text=Once it was at the station we were so excited , we ran out to the platform and boarded one of the cars .
#text=We found seats quickly , unlike an airplane you just sit where you want .
#text=The train seemed to stop a lot , there were so many more stations than I realized were out there .
#text=Eventually though , we heard those magic words .
#text=We had arrived in New York City !
